definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Clay Sculpture is an old and common folk art in China.
sentences.chinese: 泥塑是中国一种古老常见的民间艺术。

sentences.english: Each hall categorizes different expo theme with a multi-faceted program of stage performances and folk art demonstrations.
sentences.chinese: 每个展厅有独特且多元化的民间艺术以及舞台表演。

sentences.english: Paper cut-out is a traditional folk art with long history in China.
sentences.chinese: 剪纸是我国历史悠久的传统民间艺术之一。

sentences.english: "Pestle music" - A folk performance of song and dance, is very rare in Mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 民间艺术歌舞在中国大陆是很少见到的。

sentences.english: The hand responds to the heart, the pettifoggery is expressive, is in the folk art essence.
sentences.chinese: 心手相应，刀笔传神，为民间艺术中的精华。

sentences.english: In 1996, Jiaozhou City was chosen as "Hometown of Folk Art of China".
sentences.chinese: 1996年胶州市被评为“中国民间艺术之乡”。

sentences.english: I spent lots of time doing research on the folk art of our country.
sentences.chinese: 我花了很多时间研究我们国家的民间艺术。

sentences.english: Allegro I was just learning, I was very interested in folk art.
sentences.chinese: 快板我是刚学的，我对民间艺术十分感兴趣。

sentences.english: The Cai's lacquer engravings reminiscently remain the unique folk art in southern Fujian province.
sentences.chinese: 漆线雕完整地保留闽南独特的民间艺术特色。

sentences.english: Literature" expression is the only way of sublimation of Chinese folk art."
sentences.chinese: “文学化过程”是民间艺术样式提升层次的必由之路。

sentences.english: My maned figure products have high quality and distinctive features.
sentences.chinese: 这才是民间艺术的吸引力，保持高质量，保持特色。

sentences.english: The Fengxiang folk art is colorful, among which the colored drawing on pottery clay sculpture bears the richest style.
sentences.chinese: 凤翔民间艺术丰富多彩，以彩绘泥塑最具风格。

sentences.english: Folk art covers a wide range.
Song- and- Dance Duet is a civil art in northeast which farmers like it deeply.
sentences.chinese: 二人转是深受东北农民喜爱的一种民间艺术。

sentences.english: Song- and- Dance Duet is a civil art of Northeast where farmers like it deeply.
sentences.chinese: 二人转是深受东北农民喜爱的一种民间艺术。

sentences.english: Painted sculpture is one of the most archaic folk art in China.
sentences.chinese: 彩塑是中国最古老的民间艺术之一。

definition: local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc

definition: papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
